minions.name: General Ivan
minions.description: Ongoing: Your minions cannot be destroyed

minions.name: Polar Commando
minions.description: Ongoing: If this is your only minion on this base, it has +2 power and cannot be destroyed

minions.name: Bear Cavalry
minions.description: Move another player's minion from here to another base

minions.name: Cub Scout
minions.description: Ongoing: After another players minion moves here, if it has less power than this minion, destroy it

actions.name: Bear Hug
actions.description: Each other player destroys his or her minion with the least power (owner chooses in case of ties)

actions.name: Bear Necessities
actions.description: Destroy an action that has been played on a minion or base

actions.name: Bear Rides You
actions.description: Move one of your minions to another base

actions.name: Commission
actions.description: Play an extra minion. Then move another player's minion from the extra minion's base to another base

actions.name: High Ground
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, destroy any other player's minion that moves here

actions.name: Superiority
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be destroyed, moved, or returned to your hand or deck by other players' cards

actions.name: You're Pretty Much Borscht
actions.description: Choose a base where you have a minion. Move all other players' minions from there to one other base

actions.name: You're Screwed
actions.description: Choose a base where you have a minion. Move another player's minion from there to another base
